CVE.summary: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in vSpin.net Classified System 2004 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) cat parameter to (a) cat.asp, or the (2) keyword, (3) order, (4) sort, (5) menuSelect, or (6) state parameter to (b) search.asp.

Suricata.signature: ET WEB_SPECIFIC_APPS vSpin.net Classified System SQL Injection Attempt -- cat.asp cat SELECT
